## Aris.signIn() method

Sign in

**Signature:**

```typescript
signIn(username: User['username'], password: string, isTrustedEnvironment: boolean): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  username | [User](./client.user.md)<!-- -->\['username'\] | The username |
|  password | string | The password |
|  isTrustedEnvironment | boolean | True if you want to be signed in longer |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

True if signed in
